mapper.select: select id "id", order_main_id orderMainId, order_id orderId, times "times", tuisong_flag tuisongFlag, system_role systemRole, create_oper createOper, create_time createTime, modify_oper modifyOper, modify_time modifyTime from tbl_order_outsystem where tuisong_flag = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_orderbkup_outsystem( order_main_id, order_id, times, tuisong_flag, system_role, create_oper, create_time, modify_oper, modify_time) values( #{orderMainId}, #{orderId}, #{times}, #{tuisongFlag}, #{systemRole}, #{createOper}, #{createTime}, #{modifyOper}, #{modifyTime})
